custom_fields.name: Employee Grade-custom_external_per_diem

custom_fields.label: Help
custom_fields.name: Employee Grade-custom_help
custom_fields.options:
Help

Examples

  1. Calculating GOSI based on Basic Salary Component (BS) and Housing Allowance (HA) 
    Formula: (BS+HA)*0.09
  2. For Maximum Amount Allowed For Basic And Housing Codition (use: MAX_BAS_HAL): 
    Forumula: MAX_BAS_HAL*0.09 if ((BAS+HAL) > MAX_BAS_HAL) else ((BAS+HAL)*0.09)
  3. For GOSI deduction percentage use GOSI_PERCENTAGE: 
    Forumula: 
     
1] (BAS+HAL)*GOSI_PERCENTAGE 
     
2] MAX_BAS_HAL*GOSI_PERCENTAGE if ((BAS+HAL) > MAX_BAS_HAL) else ((BAS+HAL)*GOSI_PERCENTAGE)
